title: Champion mastery

embed.description: Grades Hover over your Champion Mastery points bar in the post-game screen and you'll see the grade that our new system gives you. Grades are awarded based on your overall performance in the role along with the champion you're playing and, crucially, where you're playing them.

body:
So I recently got a gold ring around my mastery 7 thresh after I played my first ranked game we won as well but I'm am very confused about this can anyone help me wonder out what this means
Also if you look at Tengwar in the link I am going to put on he has the same thing

replies.body: It means that you've got a Hextech Chest on them from getting an S- or Higher. It has nothing to do with mastery.
It's just the max mastery not the chest indicator.
But I didn't get an s

That gold ring just means you are max mastery, it shows you that as opposed to the blue progress bar. 

http://i.imgur.com/glHgf7P.png?noredirect
Nami (who is lvl 7) has the gold ring but Zyra (at 6) doesn't.

What the other people are referring to is the gold square that appears around champions you have earned a chest on this season which looks like this (see Lux):
http://i.imgur.com/IYWkSRC.png?noredirect
